## Describe the bug

A clear description of what is wrong.

## Which file is affected?

- [ ] Pattern file (`agent/patterns/`)
- [ ] Template source file (`agent/files/src/` or `agent/files/examples/`)
- [ ] Documentation (`docs/`)
- [ ] Other (specify below)

File path: `<!-- e.g. agent/files/src/services/user.service.ts -->`

## Expected behavior

What should the code/documentation say or do?

## Actual behavior

What does it currently say or do?

## Steps to reproduce

If applicable, minimal steps to reproduce the issue.
